title: Modular Audio Interface
description: Hardware-software system for professional audio production with modular connectivity.
longDescription:
Development of a modular audio interface system that bridges professional studio equipment with modern digital workflows. The project required extensive research into signal processing, electromagnetic compatibility, and user interface design.

Technical specifications:
• 24-bit/192kHz conversion
• Modular I/O expansion
• Software-controlled routing matrix
• USB-C and Thunderbolt connectivity
• Field-replaceable components

title: Inventory Management Platform
description: Digital tool for tracking and optimizing physical product inventory across multiple locations.
longDescription:
Comprehensive platform for managing physical inventory across distributed locations. System integrates barcode scanning, predictive analytics, and automated reordering to minimize stockouts while optimizing storage costs.

Core functionality:
• Real-time inventory tracking
• Predictive demand modeling
• Automated procurement workflows
• Multi-location synchronization
• Integration with existing ERP systems

title: Sustainable Lighting System
description: Environmentally conscious lighting fixtures with intelligent control and minimal material waste.
longDescription:
Design and engineering of a modular lighting system prioritizing material efficiency and longevity. Each fixture incorporates recyclable components, field-replaceable LED modules, and intelligent dimming controls.

Sustainability features:
• 95% recyclable materials
• 50,000+ hour LED lifespan
• Daylight harvesting sensors
• Occupancy-based dimming
• Minimal packaging design
• Local manufacturing capability

title: Workspace Acoustic Panel System
description: Modular sound absorption system for open office environments.
longDescription:
Acoustic panel system designed to address noise pollution in contemporary workspaces. Panels feature recyclable core materials with fabric coverings available in multiple configurations.

System features:
• NRC rating of 0.85
• Tool-free installation
• Multiple mounting options
• Sustainable material sourcing
• Custom sizing available
• Integrated cable management

title: Medical Device Interface
description: Touch interface for diagnostic equipment with emphasis on clarity and precision.
longDescription:
User interface design for critical medical diagnostic equipment requiring precise data input and clear information display. Project involved extensive user research with medical professionals.

Design considerations:
• FDA compliance requirements
• High contrast display optimization
• Gesture-based navigation
• Sterile operation compatibility
• Emergency procedure protocols
• Multi-language support
